items.sentence: I think it\'s time for me to buy my son a car.
I think it\'s time for me to clean the garage.
Tom bought this camera for a reasonable price.
Tom broke his collarbone when he was thirteen.
Tom came back home just in time for Christmas.
Tom came to Australia to visit his girlfriend.
Tom complained about the room being too small.
Tom put the engagement ring on Mary\'s finger.
You have to go the rest of the way without me.
You may give this picture to whoever wants it.
